application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Submission of post construction energy equipment monitoring details including financial contribution, installation of equipment and proof of contractual arrangement in pursuant to condition 24 of planning permission ref: 216353NMAR3 dated 10/05/2022 in relation to planning permission reference 200486FUL for 'Construction of three x two storey buildings and one x three storey building to provide 40 residential units and a community and caretaker facility; reconfiguration of vehicle parking provision and associated refuse storage, cycle storage and vehicle parking; and hard and soft landscaping (following demolition of garages and community and caretaker facility) (Regulation 3 - Application by London Borough of Ealing)'
